name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in utilizing **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **MongoDB** to construct high-performance backend solutions. My deep expertise includes frameworks such as **Koa**, **NestJS**, and **Kafka**, enabling me to develop scalable and resilient systems. I possess a solid background in implementing *observability tools* and *performance monitoring* to ensure optimal system performance.
Additionally, I bring ownership and effective communication skills to project teams, fostering collaboration and transparency. My experience extends to deploying robust applications in the healthcare and financial sectors while aligning with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I also have proficiency in integrating microservices architecture and CI/CD practices to enhance deployment efficiency.
